Honduras ex-President Hernandez, once a US ally, faces drug trafficking trialFormer Honduras President Juan Orlando Hernandez's trial on U.S. drug trafficking charges starts Tuesday, giving a New York jury the chance to determine whether Washington's onetime key anti-drug ally actually ran the Central American country as a "narco-state." Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:04:56 GMT UYIAA74TEZNMDMKAW4FFZBJLRM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/honduras-ex-president-hernandez-once-us-ally-faces-drug-trafficking-trial-2024-02-20/Luc Cohen世界美洲
Fentanyl use spreads deeper into Mexico, worrying authoritiesThe teenager who arrived at Jose de Jesus Lopez's drug rehab clinic in the industrial Mexican city of Monterrey in December had unusual symptoms. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:04:32 GMT WIRZH6YZ2NLN3L4R5FZ6RVLFN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/fentanyl-use-spreads-deeper-into-mexico-worrying-authorities-2024-02-20/Laura Gottesdiener, Brendan O'Boyle世界美洲
Israel to bar some Muslim citizens from Jerusalem mosque in RamadanIsrael will cap the number of Muslim citizens who take part in peak prayers at Jerusalem's Al Aqsa Mosque during the upcoming Ramadan holy month, the police minister said on Tuesday, citing concern the flashpoint site could see protests at the Gaza war. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:44:51 GMT BDIC45QPPNKBJB7OLXP53W2FWE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-bar-some-muslim-citizens-jerusalem-mosque-ramadan-2024-02-20/Reuters世界中东
WHO completes second Gaza hospital evacuation amid fightingThe World Health Organization said on Tuesday it had completed a second evacuation mission from Gaza's Nasser Hospital, transferring a total of 32 critical patients including children from the site amid fighting. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:41:09 GMT XVHXZLKGW5LXVOHNIED3O7JLXM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/who-completes-second-gaza-hospital-evacuation-amid-fighting-2024-02-20/Reuters世界中东
Putin has not watched Yulia Navalnaya's video statement, says KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin has not watched a video statement by Yulia Navalnaya in which she vowed to continue Alexei Navalny's work, but her assertion he was poisoned with a nerve agent is unfounded, the Kremlin said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:38:34 GMT NEYQONWN4NKSPGMQDY3LO5AFKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-has-not-watched-yulia-navalnayas-video-statement-says-kremlin-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Avdiivka, a Ukrainian town taken by Russia, shown in ruinsThe trees are splintered, the houses wrecked, the surviving civilians live in basements, NATO ammunition has been abandoned - this is the picture shown by footage released by Russia from the ruins of the Ukrainian town of Avdiivka. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:37:04 GMT MZMWUSFS6NL77OKH7NPV3QELLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/avdiivka-ukrainian-town-taken-by- Russia-shown-ruins-2024-02-20/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
UK's new drone proposals to allow flying medical deliveries, rail checksBritain wants to permit more drone flying for uses such as delivering medical supplies and inspecting railways and power lines, the UK's Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:33:03 GMT QCLUCKCOXJP6PFZ7AEFUERF4XQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-new-drone-proposals-allow-flying-medical-deliveries-rail-checks-2024-02-20/Reuters世界英国
South Africa asks World Court to find Israeli occupation illegalSouth Africa on Tuesday urged the International Court of Justice (ICJ) to issue a non-binding legal opinion that the Israeli occupation of Palestinian territories is illegal, arguing it would help efforts to reach a settlement. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:15:53 GMT QL6BJTZAOJMIPM6VNCVCGFEQ6U https://www.reuters.com/world/south-africa-asks-world-court-find-israeli-ocupation-illegal-2024-02-20/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界
Polish justice minister to present 'rule of law' action plan in BrusselsPolish Justice Minister Adam Bodnar was set to present an action plan in Brussels on Tuesday "to restore the rule of law" after eight years of rule by the nationalist Law and Justice (PiS) party that led to the freezing of billions of euros in EU funds. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:52:57 GMT FKJAXVRKMZMJFGX7DME5EDRINI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-justice-minister-present-rule-law-action-plan-brussels-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
UN earmarks $100 mln for poorly funded humanitarian crisesThe United Nations said on Tuesday it was allocating $100 million to support poorly funded humanitarian crises in seven countries, including the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), Sudan and Syria. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:38:35 GMT AHQ23HCWBBLTXCHQKVVM5CS6TI https://www.reuters.com/world/un-earmarks-100-mln-poorly-funded-Humanarian-crises-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
UK's Cameron vows to protect Falkland IslandsBritish foreign minister David Cameron vowed on Monday to help protect the Falkland Islands as long as they wanted to remain under British control despite attempts by Argentina's new leader to reopen negotiations on their sovereignty. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:28:18 GMT KD544D2QLVMXLEVXO6PCQWVQ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-cameron-vows-protect-falkland-islands-2024-02-20/Reuters世界英国
